de.wagnst.tpe.exercises.exercise2.master

Class Amount

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.wagnst.tpe.exercises.exercise2.master.Amount

  • public final class Amount
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to make different arithmetic operation with the Amounts. An amount consists of classical money and a currency which has to be created according to the Currency class.

    New instances can be created with the help of the constructor 

     Amount amount = new Amount(100.00, Currencies.EURO);
    Objects of this class are immutable. The methods don't change the state of their object, but return a new object.
    Author:
    wagnst, Rathainka
